featured.text: The King agreed and gave Nehemiah a letter “to the governors of the province beyond the river,” requesting safe passage for him as he travelled through their lands.
The disciple felt sad to hear this, but he agreed to do as he was told.
Scientists agree that synesthesia has a genetic basis, because it frequently runs in families.
I don’t agree with caging animals for our entertainment.

other.text: Ali gladly agreed and waited to see if Nasreddin would again give him back two pots.
Mr. Liu: Well, I wish I agree with you, but I don’t.
Agree to use each other’s cars, and you can save bucks on car rentals, too.
Most viewers agreed that the movie was not as good as the book.

definition.zh_def: 同意，贊成某個觀點或決定。
definition.en_def: To have the same opinion or to accept a proposal.
definition.example: I agree with your suggestion to improve the project.
